name: Chilled Cucumber and Wood Ear Mushroom Salad
author: MyNutriCounter
summary: Nutritionally boost your day with this chilled cucumber and wood ear mushroom salad. It's an effective way of getting flavor and nutrients rolled up into one meal. Wood ear mushroom, commonly sold in Asian markets, is a dear ingredient-mate of the cucumber in the cooking of this tantalizing salad.
ingredients: ½ ounce dried wood ear mushrooms
½ teaspoon chopped Thai chile pepper
directions: Soak mushrooms in water until hydrated, 15 to 20 minutes
Drain and place in a saucepan over medium heat; boil for 2 minutes
Combine lime juice, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, sugar, and chile pepper in a bowl
Toss in cucumber, mushrooms, and sesame seeds
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving
